description: Multiple days with a full pack, ambitious dawn-to-dusk adventures with friends, quick rambles after work – the lightweight Gamma is made for hiking. Breathable, comfortable, and durable enough for backcountry travel, the Aequora AirPerm™ softshell fabric’s performance stretch frees you to move on technical terrain. Zippered pockets include one at the thigh that’s accessible while wearing a pack, an integrated belt secures the fit, and the streamlined design is patterned for freedom of movement.
name: Arcteryx Gamma Lightweight Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens
